title: Create a selection input field
description: Create the Json Schema for a selection input field of a form

fields.label: Field Label
fields.name: label
fields.placeholder: What do users select from this field eg. Meal Time

fields.label: Separator string
fields.name: separator
fields.placeholder: Enter a string to separate item names in the list of item name in the field below

fields.label: List of Selection Item Names
fields.name: item names
fields.placeholder: Enter Item Names separated by the separator string from the field above eg. Breakfast | Lunch | Dinner

fields.label: List of Selection Item Values
fields.name: item values
fields.placeholder: Enter the value for each Item Name from the field above, separated by the separator string eg. 7am | 12pm | 5pm

fields.label: Default Selection Value
fields.name: default value
fields.placeholder: Enter an item value from the "List of Selection Item Values" above
